name: StartAssessment
description:
Start an assessment using the Ashby API.

This tool initiates an assessment process via the Ashby platform. It should be called when an assessment needs to be started and provides confirmation once initiated.

parameters.name: assessment_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for starting the assessment, including 'assessment_type_id', 'candidate', 'application', and 'job'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
